summary: Black retex of the Dragonborn DLC\'s Morag Tong armor.
descriptionHtml:
I was disappointed when I saw that the Morag Tong assassins were wearing a darker Chitin Armor.  I\'m no modding expert but I know how to make an image black and white.  Now the armor is even darker and more assassinish.  Dragonborn DLC required.  Drop the file in your Skyrim data folder and you should be all set.

NOTE:  The Tong armor does not have its own 1st person texture.  The armor will look like Chitin light when viewed in 1st person.  I\'ve included an optional file that converts Chitin light armor to black.
author: Bladefirst

files.name: Morag Tong and Chitin Light Black
files.fileName: Morag Tong and Chitin Light Black-31301-1.rar
